titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary reduction of duty on viscose rayon staple fibers having a decitex of less than 5.0.
A bill to extend the temporary reduction of duty on viscose rayon staple fibers having a decitex of less than 5.0.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend temporarily the reduction of duty on viscose rayon staple fibers having a decitex of less than 5.0.
